string.name: desc
string.value: A stronger version of the Lifeforce Potion. It contains a higher concentration of rare ingredients and increases the drinker's maximum health points by 250. This potion can only be consumed after using 10 of the Lifeforce Potions. \n#cThe usage of this potion is restricted to levels above 70.#

string.name: name
string.value: Painful Truth

string.name: desc
string.value: It's the absolute truth, but it really hurts. It might be better to not know the truth, for what you don't know can't hurt you. Provides WEAPON ATT +10 and MAGIC ATT +8 in your enraged state, but you suffer -50 MP for mental trauma.

string.name: name
string.value: White Lie

string.name: desc
string.value: What you don't know can't hurt you. If the truth is too much to handle, avoiding it may be wise. It provides Critical +10 in your consideration for others, but you suffer -80 HP because of the anxiety that comes after telling a lie.

string.name: name
string.value: Advanced Equip Enhancement Scroll

string.name: desc
string.value:
Enhances #can equipment item that has been upgraded#.
The higher number of successes, the better chance of applying advanced options.
If failed, the item is destroyed.

#c[Enhancement Success Rate]#
1 success: 100%
2 successes: 90%
3 successes: 80%
4 successes: 70%
5 successes: 60%
6 successes: 50%
7 successes: 40%
8 successes: 30%
9 successes: 20%
10 or more successes: 10%

string.name: name
string.value: Equip Enhancement Scroll

string.name: desc
string.value:
Enhances #can equipment item that has been upgraded#.
The higher number of successes, the better chance of applying advanced options.
If failed, the item is destroyed.

#c[Enhancement Success Rate]#
1 success: 80%
2 successes: 70%
3 successes: 60%
4 successes: 50%
5 successes: 40%
6 successes: 30%
7 successes: 20%
8 or more successes: 10%

string.name: name
string.value: Supreme Lifeforce Potion

string.name: desc
string.value: The most powerful of the three potions. It is crafted using the rarest and most potent ingredients and increases the drinker's maximum health points by 500. This potion can only be used after consuming 10 Greater Lifeforce Potions. Those who can withstand its effects gain a significant advantage in battle. \n#cThe usage of this potion is restricted to levels above 120.#

string.name: name
string.value: Teleportation Potion

string.name: desc
string.value: This rare potion, can teleport players to a random location within the vast Maple World in an instant, the potion can transport players to remote and dangerous locations. It's advised to collect multiple potions to explore as many different areas as possible, though the unpredictable nature of the potion means that it could lead to certain death if the player is teleported to a location beyond their abilities.

string.name: name
string.value: Wrath Potion

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases damage by 10%.

string.name: name
string.value: Lifeforce Potion

string.name: desc
string.value: A magical concoction that increases the drinker's maximum health points by 100. It can only be used a few times before the body becomes resistant to its effects. \n#cThe usage of this potion is restricted to levels above 30.#

string.value: Hokkien Mee

string.name: desc
string.value: Singapore's local speciality prawn noodles. It is normally served with prawns, chili & lime. \nRecovers 1200 HP.

string.name: name
string.value: Carrot Cake

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious local traditional food. It is made up of carrot extracts & secret recipes. \nRecovers 1800 HP.

string.name: name
string.value: Chicken Rice

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious Singapore local traditional food. The rice is covered with the fragrant secret recipes of chicken extracts.\nRecovers 2200 HP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious Singapore local traditional BBQ food. It is normally served with curry sauces. Its fragrance can be sensed a distance away.\nRecovers 2600 HP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fruit that is hard & sour. Its nutritional value improves our digestive system.\nRecovers 500 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fruit that is delicious & juicy. It is so sweet that it attracts ants if they are not well attended to. \nRecovers 800 MP

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Fruit

string.name: desc
string.value: Another fruit that is delicious & juicy, similar to Rambutan, it will attract unwanted pests if they are not attended. \nRecovers 1600 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: The fruit is nominated as the King of Fruits around the region. Despite having a hard & thorny shell, the fruit that lies within is extremely fragrant, and it tastes great! \nRecovers 3200 MP.

string.name: name
string.value: Nasi Lemak

string.name: desc
string.value: A popular Malay Traditional Dish mainly made up of rice, egg & cucumber, soaked with pandan fragrant.nImproves Magic Attack +8 for 5 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Roti Prata

string.name: desc
string.value: A popular Indian Traditional Dish made up of flour. It is normally served with sugar & curry sauces.n Improves Magic Attack +8 for 10 Minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Pepper Crab

string.name: desc
string.value: A popular Chinese traditional dish made of up fresh steam crab, pepper, egg & secret recipes.nImproves Weapon Attack +8 for 5 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Chili Crab

string.name: desc
string.value: A popular Chinese traditional dish made of up fresh steam crab, chili power, egg & secret recipes.nImproves Weapon Attack +8 for 10 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Russellon's Potion

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion made by Russellon from Magatia. The actual effects of this potion remain a mystery...

string.value: Russellon's Potion

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion made by Russellon from Magatia. The actual effects of this potion remain a mystery...

string.value: Russellon's Potion

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion made by Russellon from Magatia. The actual effects of this potion remain a mystery...

string.name: name
string.value: MesoGears Ring

string.name: desc
string.value: An ancient ring of wondrous power. There appears to be a faded inscription along the side..."Subani". Provides a boost of +8 W. Att, +15 M. Att, +12 Def/M. Def. for 8 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Magic

string.name: desc
string.value: A special magic spell cast by Cassandra. For 30 minutes, Attack +10, Magic Attack +10, DEF +30, Accuracy +20, Avoidability +20, Speed +7, and Jump +5.

string.name: name
string.value: Cassandra's Magic

string.name: desc
string.value: A special magic spell cast by Cassandra. For 1 hour, Attack +10, Magic Attack +10, DEF +30, Accuracy +20, Avoidability +20, Speed +7, and Jump +5.

string.name: name
string.value: Edmund's Special Brew

string.name: desc
string.value: A healing tonic made with Edmund's secret recipe. Just the thing when you're feeling under the weather! [Restores 50% of HP and MP, also gives +14 W. Att + 30 M.Att, for 10 minutes.]

string.name: name
string.value: Sophilia's Necklace

string.name: desc
string.value: A jewel crafted by Prendergast for his daughter, intended as a protective gift for her 16th birthday.

null.name: [Restores all HP/MP, +50 Weapon Defense, +50 Magic Defense for 10 minutes. 5 uses.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A tasty, hot smore. Perfect for a toasty Halloween night!

null.name: [Restores 25% HP/MP and gives a boost of +10 to Avoidability, Jump and Speed for 10 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: Just one taste of this spicy candy and it'll feel like your heart's on fire!

null.name: [Gives +60 Weapon Attack, +60 Speed, +60 Avoidability for 1 minute]

string.name: name
string.value: Pumpkin Taffy

string.name: desc
string.value: Sweetened pumpkin taffy on a candy cane stick. [Gives +15 Weapon Defense, +15 Magic Defense for 5 minutes]

string.name: name
string.value: Red Gummy Slime

string.name: desc
string.value: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is cherry-flavored. If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restore 1200HP, 1200MP]

string.name: name
string.value: Green Gummy Slime

string.name: desc
string.value: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is lime-flavored. If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restores 600 HP]

string.name: name
string.value: Purple Gummy Slime

string.name: desc
string.value: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is grape-flavored. If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restores 600 MP]

string.name: name
string.value: Orange Gummy Slime

string.name: desc
string.value: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is orange-flavored. If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restores 600HP, 600MP]

string.name: name
string.value: Maple Pop

string.name: desc
string.value: A mouth-watering, delectable sweet treat! [Gives +100 Accuracy for 1 minute]

string.name: name
string.value: Tae Roon's Note

string.name: desc
string.value: A small note written by Tae Roon. This note is enchanted, so it boosts weapon attack and magic attack by 3 for 1 minute.

string.name: name
string.value: Mushroom Candy

string.name: desc
string.value: Delicious mushroom candy from Sen. This candy makes anyone feel good about themselves. So good, that it boosts Jump +3 for 3 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Pumpkin Pieces

string.name: desc
string.value: Pieces of pumpkin left over from making halloween Jack-o'-Lanterns. The pumpkin, perfectly ripe, has an aroma that is sweeter than ever. Each piece recovers 50 HP and 50 MP.

string.name: name
string.value: Halloween Candy

string.name: desc
string.value: A candy wrapped in stripes. Kids love it. Recovers 20 HP and MP.

string.name: name
string.value: Power of the Glowing Rock

string.name: desc
string.value: Received a mysterious power from the Glowing Rock. Boosts the weapon attack and magic attack slightly for 10 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Coconut Juice

string.name: desc
string.value: A small hole is up on the top of the Coconut, where the straw goes in. Drink the juice with the straw for maximum refreshment. Recovers 100 HP.

string.name: name
string.value: Attack Crystal

string.name: desc
string.value: A red crystal with a mysterious power packed in. Attack +5 for 5 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Accuracy Crystal

string.name: desc
string.value: A blue crystal with a mysterious power packed in. Accuracy +5 for 5 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Stuffing Scoop

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious scoop of stuffing. This treat comes around only once in a while so eat it up before it gets cold. \n[Restores 600 HP/ 600 MP]

string.name: name
string.value: Cranberry Sauce

string.name: desc
string.value: This delicious cranberry sauce complements almost any meal! \n[Gives + 30 Magic Attack for 3 minutes]

string.name: name
string.value: Mashed Potato

string.name: desc
string.value: It looks like someone dropped this potato. \n[Restores 800 HP]

string.name: desc
string.value: The only thing better than a gravy boat is a gravy train. \n[Restores 800 MP]

string.name: name
string.value: Snowing Fishbread

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Physical Attack Power by 20 and Magic Attack Power by 30 for 15 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Power Punch

string.name: desc
string.value: A fist used during the Hunting Tournament. Boosts weapon and magic attack.

string.name: name
string.value: Wing of the Wind

string.name: desc
string.value: A set of wings used during the Hunting Tournament. Boosts speed and jump.

string.name: name
string.value: Crazy Skull

string.name: desc
string.value: An eyeball-rotating skull used during the Hunting Tournament. Inverts directions.

string.name: desc
string.value: A shield used during the Hunting Tournament. Protects the owner from the bomb once.

string.name: name
string.value: Maplemas Ham

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious looking Christmas Ham with a sprig of mistletoe on top.\nRecovers 3000 HP and MP.

string.name: name
string.value: Smoken Salmon

string.name: desc
string.value: The traditional Versalmas dinner. Smells... like fish. \nRecovers 2385 HP and 3791 MP.

string.name: name
string.value: Swiss Cheese

string.name: desc
string.value: Cheese from the alternate dimension of Versal. Looks funny but smells quite nice. \nGives +220 Magic Attack for 2 minutes

string.name: name
string.value: Sugar-Coated Olives

string.name: desc
string.value: Olives frosted with pink sugar -- a special treat beloved by children from Versal! \nGives +40 Speed and + 25 Jump for 5 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Caramel Onion

string.name: desc
string.value: O-Pongo's favorite treat! Creamy caramel with a crunchy onion center! \nRestores 800 HP and MP.

string.name: name
string.value: Chocolate Wafers

string.name: desc
string.value: A crispy wafer layered with chocolate creme. \nGives +40 Weapon Attack for 3 minutes

string.name: desc
string.value: SPF 1000. Blocks all harmful rays, including magical ones. \nGives +200 Magic Defense for 10 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Lump of Coal

string.name: desc
string.value: Restores 1 HP and 1 MP.

string.name: name
string.value: Snow Cake Piece

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of cake that consists of snow-white whipped cream and cherry. Recovers 300 HP and MP.

string.name: name
string.value: A Flurry of Snow

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Physical Attack Power by 20 and Magic Attack Power by 30 for 15 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Chinese Firecrackers

string.name: desc
string.value: A string of Chinese firecrackers known to scare away ghoulish spirits.

string.name: name
string.value: Naricain's Demon Elixir

string.name: desc
string.value: A fiery black liquid that gives the user the power of a thousand demons when consumed. [Gives +140 Weapon Attack for 8 minutes]

string.name: name
string.value: Subani's Mystic Cauldron

string.name: desc
string.value: Drinking the swirling blue liquid within this small iron pot fills the user with an energy that emanates a protective aura. [Gives +100 Overall Defense, +200 Magic Attack for 10 minutes]

string.name: name
string.value: Barricade Booster

string.name: desc
string.value: John Barricade's special concoction, used to get him out of tight jams. For use in emergencies! [Gives +50 Avoidability, +50 Accuracy, +10 Jump for 5 minutes]

string.name: name
string.value: Sweet Heart

string.name: desc
string.value: Weapon attack +20, Magic attack +30 for 15 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Power Scream

string.name: desc
string.value: A power scream from Maple Admin. Weapon attack +8, Magic attack +12 for 30 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Party Bear

string.name: desc
string.value: Weapon attack +20, Magic attack +30 for 15 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: MISSING NAME

string.name: desc
string.value: MISSING INFO

string.name: name
string.value: Taru Face Paint

string.name: desc
string.value: This mystical camouflage allows the user to blend into his or her surroundings. [Gives +100 Avoidability for 5 minutes.]

string.name: name
string.value: Primal Brew

string.name: desc
string.value: A mixture made from an ancient Taru shaman recipe. Instills warriors with the primal strength of the Jungle Spirit. [Gives +35 Weapon Attack, +10 Accuracy for 20 minutes.]

string.name: name
string.value: Spirit Herbs

string.name: desc
string.value: Special incense used by ancient Taru shamans for communion rituals with the Jungle Spirit. [Gives +90 Magic Attack for 20 minutes.]

string.name: name
string.value: Jungle Juice

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious natural beverage made from a secret blend of jungle fruits, flowers, roots, and vines. The perfect thing to fuel a Taru brave through a long jungle trek! [Restores 1000 HP and 2000 MP.]

string.name: name
string.value: Treasure Hunt Note

string.name: desc
string.value: Spread all over the Maple World for the 4th anniversary of MapleStory, this note contains the prizes that you'll win when this is found.

string.name: name
string.value: Chocolate Cream Cupcake

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious chocolate cupcake with vanilla cream filling. One taste and you'll be hooked! [Restores 300 HP & MP, and gives +30 Accuracy, +30 Speed, and +30 Jump for 3 minutes.]

string.name: name
string.value: Big Cream Puff

string.name: desc
string.value: A rare, tasty dessert. Known as the 'Warrior's Dessert' to some and the 'Fattening Treat' to others. [Gives +30 Weapon Attack for 3 minutes.]

string.name: name
string.value: Fish Net with a Catch

string.name: desc
string.value: The fish net seems to have caught something. Let's double-click it to check its content.

string.name: name
string.value: Big Belly Fish

string.name: desc
string.value: A fish that apparently swallowed something. Let's double-click on the fish to check its content.

string.name: name
string.value: Blessing of the Forest

string.name: desc
string.value: With the purified forest raining gold rain, all affected will receive a temporary boost on speed and jump.

string.name: name
string.value: Agent O's Encouragement

string.name: desc
string.value: An encouraging message from Agent O. Jump rate will be increased by 20 for 30 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Agent O's Encouragement

string.name: desc
string.value: An encouraging message from Agent O. Speed will be increased by 40 for 30 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Baby Chick Cookie

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a cookie shaped like a baby chick. Recovers 1000 HP and MP.

string.name: name
string.value: Secret Box

string.name: desc
string.value: Secret Box

string.name: name
string.value: Sorcerer's Potion

string.name: desc
string.value: This is a potion that you can buy from Sorcerer. It's potent, but its side-effects are equally strong. It's also very expensive, so be careful with it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Looks suspiciously like an energy drink. Drink at your own risk! [Gives +14 Weapon Attack for 15 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Looks suspiciously like an energy drink. Drink at your own risk! [Gives +22 Weapon Attack for 10 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Looks suspiciously like an energy drink. Drink at your own risk! [Gives +90 Weapon Attack for 1 minute]

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Looks suspiciously like an energy drink, but drink at your own risk! [Gives +50 Magic Attack for 10 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Looks suspiciously like an energy drink, but drink at your own risk! [Gives +200 Magic Attack for 30 seconds.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Tasty and strong enough to dissolve rust from machinery! Drink at your own risk! [Gives +700 Magic Attack for 10 seconds.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A futuristic power pack full of liquid fuel synthesized by T-1337. Drink at your own risk! Gives the user a sudden jolting surge of energy, so use it or lose it! [Gives +1000 Magic Attack for 5 seconds.]

string.name: name
string.value: The Energizer Drink

string.name: desc
string.value: An energizing drink packed with electrolytes. For 30 minutes, you will receive a boost of: Attack +25, Magic Attack +30, Defense +30

string.value: Fire Grill Skewer

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious holiday food made out of beef, mushroom, and bellflower on a skewer.

string.value: Tick-Tock's Egg

string.value: This is Tick-Tock's egg. There must be something inside.

string.value: This is Cronos' egg. There must be something inside.

string.value: Sweet Rice Cake

string.name: desc

string.value: Sweet Rice Cake

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet, tasty rice cake. ATT +8, MP +8 for 15 minutes.

string.value: Sweet Rice Cake

string.name: name
string.value: Small Stories

string.name: desc
string.value: A tape that contains various small stories from daily life. You can fine view its content by double-clicking on it.

string.name: name
string.value: Gaga's Appreciation

string.name: desc
string.value: Gaga's appreciation. For an hour, your attack and magic rate will go up 20, defense rate 100, accuracy and avoidability 50, and speed and jump ability will go up 10.

string.name: name
string.value: Gaga's Appreciation

string.name: desc
string.value: Gaga's appreciation. For 20 minutes, your attack rate and magic will go up 10, defense rate 30, accuracy and avoidability 20, and speed and jump ability will go up 3.

string.name: name
string.value: Mysterious Box

string.name: desc
string.value: A box with something mysterious inside. I should open it to see what it could be. If it's my lucky day, I might find an awesome gift inside.n#cYou can open it by double-clicking on it.#

string.value: Return to New Leaf City Scroll

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this scroll to venture back to New Leaf City whenever you want!

string.name: name
string.value: The Knight's Magic Scroll

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that the Red Lion King gave to his knights. When used, you will move to the Audience Room of the Red Lion King.

string.name: name
string.value: Return Scroll - Banished Area

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to the map where you were last banished. Requires immediate use and have changed neither maps nor channels.

string.name: name
string.value: Masked Man's Invitation

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation from the Masked Man to the Halloween Party at the Haunted Mansion. Double-click to move straight to the mansion.

string.name: name
string.value: Studio Invitation

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation to the studio for the event "For Guild Only".

string.name: name
string.value: Invitation to the Moon

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation to the moon, sent by the Moon Bunnies. Using this will send you directly to Moon Bunny's ????.

string.name: name
string.value: Invitation to the Nest

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation to the baby bird's nest sent by Gaga. Use it to be sent directly to the nest.

string.name: name
string.value: Invitation to Ereve

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation to Ereve from Neinheart. This invitation will allow you to instantly move to Ereve.

string.name: name
string.value: Family Studio Photo Coupon

string.name: desc
string.value: A coupon that allows you to attend the 6th Anniversary Family Photo Shoot Event.

string.name: name
string.value: Rien Teleport Ticket

string.name: desc
string.value: A teleport ticket given by the Maple Admin. It will immediately teleport you to Rien.

string.name: name
string.value: Richie Gold's Strange Lamp

string.name: desc
string.value: An unbelievable lamp made by Richie Gold. Use this, and you'll be led somewhere in in the maze. No one knows exactly where you'll be sent, though.

string.name: desc
string.value: These are steel throwing stars given by Dark Lord for Beginner Thieves. Unlike normal throwing stars, you can't recharge it. \nAttack + 15

string.name: name
string.value: Dry Treat

string.name: desc
string.value: A high-quality dry treat that the Pigmies love. Pets love them, too.

string.value: New Year's Card

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on the item to send a New Year's card to a character of your choice.

string.name: name
string.value: Lie Detector Test

string.name: desc
string.value: Can be used on suspected botters. Usable only when a suspect is hunting.

string.name: name
string.value: Orange Mushroom Piece

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Orange Mushroom. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Orange Mushroom. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: name
string.value: Ribbon Pig Piece

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Ribbon Pig. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Ribbon Pig. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: name
string.value: Grey Piece

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Grey. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Grey. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: name
string.value: Dragon Elixir

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious elixir made by Moira which enables anyone that drinks this potion to temporarily transform into a dragon.

string.name: name
string.value: Blue Ribbon Pig Piece

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Blue Ribbon Pig. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Blue Ribbon Pig. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: name
string.value: Tigun Transformation Bundle.

string.name: desc
string.value: A secret medicine that allows you to transform into Tigun, the patrol guard.

string.name: name
string.value: Rainbow-colored Snail Shell

string.name: desc
string.value: A special shell only found through Mano. Apparently it's powerful enough to grant a wish...

string.name: name
string.value: Change to Ghost

string.name: desc
string.value: First the body feels light, then all of a sudden, you're floating. Oh no, you're a ghost!

string.name: name
string.value: Ghost Candy

string.name: desc
string.value: A ghost-shaped candy with a mysterious set of ingredients. Apparently it has some special powers.

string.name: name
string.value: Sophillia's Abandoned Doll

string.name: desc
string.value: An abandoned doll that Sophillia threw away a long time ago, but revived by the Masked Man. Pet its hair, and you'll turn into Sophillia for 3 minutes.

string.name: name
string.value: Potion of Transformation

string.name: desc
string.value: The moment this potion is taken, you'll become a powerful, otherworldly being.

string.name: name
string.value: Potion of Transformation

string.name: desc
string.value: The moment this potion is taken, you'll become a powerful, otherworldly being.

string.value: Change to Mouse

string.name: desc
string.value: Transform into a small, tiny mouse.

string.name: name
string.value: Mini Draco Transformation

string.name: desc
string.value: The mysterious skills of an old halfling has transformed you into a form of a dragon. You can now fly.

string.name: name
string.value: Moon Photo

string.name: desc
string.value: The more you look at it, the more you feel lightheaded… and you feel closer to the moon.

string.name: name
string.value: Sweet Rice Cake

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet, delicious rice cake. Sometimes creates an interesting set of powers.

string.name: name
string.value: Gaga Transformation Potion

string.name: name

string.name: name
string.value: Geppetto Transformation

string.name: desc

string.value: Moonstone Engagement Ring Box

string.name: desc
string.value: Restores tamed monster's fatigue level by 30.

string.name: name
string.value: Pheromone Perfume

string.name: desc
string.value: A perfume created by Kenta using Pheromone. Enables the user to tame hogs down at the Korean Folk Village.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pouch with a jewel on the surface. Possesses a special power in that double-clicking the pouch will suck up the surrounding ghosts in the area.

string.name: name
string.value: Element Rock

string.name: desc
string.value: A special alchemist tool that converts an absorbed power of monster into a jewel. The inner part seems to be slightly transparent.

string.name: name
string.value: Cliff's Magic Cane

string.name: desc
string.value: A magic cane that tames the lost Rudolph.

string.name: name
string.value: Purification Marble

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a special magic marble that can contain and purify a monster.

string.name: name
string.value: 1st Transparent Marble

string.name: desc
string.value: A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 1st floor.

string.name: name
string.value: 2nd Transparent Marble

string.name: desc
string.value: A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 2nd floor.

string.name: name
string.value: 3rd Transparent Marble

string.name: desc
string.value: A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 3rd floor.

string.name: name
string.value: Fish Net

string.name: desc
string.value: A fish net intended to catch something. Can be used with Gaga.

string.name: name
string.value: Red Ribbon Pig

string.name: desc
string.value: A red ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: name
string.value: Green Ribbon Pig

string.name: desc
string.value: A green ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: name
string.value: Blue Ribbon Pig

string.name: desc
string.value: A blue ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: name
string.value: Purple Ribbon Pig

string.name: desc
string.value: A purple ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A rope used for catching a weakened Ribbon Pig. Double-click on it to catch the pig.

string.name: name
string.value: Lava Bottle

string.name: desc
string.value: A glass bottle that contains an actual lava, which is waiting to be spilled out. Drink this lava, and the lava will consume the body with fire, which will enable the drinker to master Fire Demon.

string.name: name
string.value: Black Cloud Machine

string.name: desc
string.value: A mechanical device that produces black clouds. Enables the character to acquire the Smokescreen skill using the clouds.

string.name: name
string.value: Firm Hand

string.name: desc
string.value: A stimulant packaged inside a bottle that resembles a clenched fist. Drinking the stimulant will allow the character to acquire The Will of a Warrior.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fresh from the fertile earth back in Maple Island! The fishes simply love these baits!

string.name: name
string.value: Delicious Bait

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the EXP and Meso earned by fishing by 1.5 times! Don't try to eat it just because it is too delicious!

string.name: name
string.value: The Owl of Minerva

string.name: desc
string.value: #cThe Owl of Minerva#, which represents wisdom, can be used to search for items sold at the Free Market. #cDisappears right after showing the results of the item search#.

string.name: name
string.value: Teleport Rock

string.name: desc
string.value: Remembers 5 maps of your choice. This rock will enable you to #cteleport to the map you remembered#. It can even allow you to #cmove to the map where a certain character is#, provided that the person is in the same channel at the same world.

string.name: name
string.value: White Scroll

string.name: desc
string.value: One of Subani's sacred Scrolls. If used in conjunction with a normal or Dark Scroll, the number of item upgrade slots will not be deducted if the scroll fails. However, if using a Dark Scroll, there is still a chance that your weapon will be destroyed.

string.name: name
string.value: Change to Ghost

string.name: desc
string.value: First the body feels light, then all of a sudden, you're floating. Oh no, you're a ghost!

string.name: name
string.value: Ghost Candy

string.name: desc
string.value: A ghost-shaped candy with a mysterious set of ingredients. Take this to change into a ghost for 1 hour.

string.name: name
string.value: Board the Spaceship

string.name: desc
string.value: Let's go rescue Gaga!

string.name: name

string.name: desc

string.name: name
string.value: Gaga's First Tasty Watermelon

string.name: desc
string.value:
A tasty watermelon obtained from the Tasty Watermelon Pot. Better enjoy it before it goes bad!
#cDouble-click on it to obtain
an Alarm Clock (Right) and one of the following buffs:
-Lv. 30 or below-
ATT/M. ATT +20
DEF +200
HP +500
-Lv. 31-70-
Attack Power +30
DEF +300
HP +1000
-Lv. 71 or higher-
Attack Power +40
DEF +400
HP +1500
Buffs can be stacked with other buffs, aside from additional watermelon buffs.#

string.name: name
string.value: Tasty Watermelon Necklace Box

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: name
string.value: Mighty Banana

string.name: desc
string.value: A powerful banana from Gaga. Its sweet scent tickles your nose. You can't consume more than 100 of them, and you can only consume them until November 12th.\n#cConsuming it will increase your EXP based on your character level.#

string.name: name
string.value: Mimir's Well Water for Cannoneers

string.name: desc
string.value: Mimir's Well Water, prepared especially for Cannoneers. You can't consume more than 100 of them and you can only consume them until December 20th.\n#cWhen consumed by a Cannoneer, EXP will increase by 10% before level 50. From level 50 to 99, EXP will increase by 5%. It can't be consumed at level 100 or higher.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Special Mimir's Well Water for all classes. You can drink it only until 2012/03/03. during the event period. Drinking this water will give you 10% EXP if you're Lv. 50 and below, 5% EXP if you're Lv. 50 - Lv. 99, 2% if you're Lv. 100 - Lv. 149, and 1% if you are Lv. 150 or higher.

string.name: name
string.value: Memory Box

string.name: desc

It does not disappear from the inventory after use. Can be used as much as desired during the event period at 30-minute intervals.

string.value: White Day Love Letter

string.name: desc

string.name: name

string.name: desc
string.value:
A sweet potion made from Maple Syrup. Your level will determine how much HP and MP are restored. Not affected by potion related skills or potentials.
#cBelow Lv. 30: HP/MP +100
Lv. 30 - 69: HP/MP +300
Lv. 70 - 99: HP/MP +1000
Lv. 100 - 119: HP/MP +2000
Lv. 120 - 149: HP/MP +3000
Lv. 150 or higher: HP/MP +4000

string.name: desc

string.value: Spiegelmann's Box of Mystery

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to get a random number between 1 and 10, then match them up with Spiegelmann's number to... win or something! Who knows? It's a mystery!\n#cCan be used until 06/30/13, the end of the event.#

string.name: name
string.value: Funkmageddon Alley Ticket

string.name: desc
string.value: The evil hip-hop super squad, De La Meow, has taken over Kerning City's back alleys! Take those ruckus making hooligans down! \nDouble-click to travel to Funkmageddon Alley, where they were last spotted busting illicit rhymes.

string.name: name

string.value: Magic pouch that opens up pocket slots. Useless to anyone who already opened up their pocket slot.

string.name: name

string.name: name
string.value: Daily Buff Coupon

string.name: desc
string.value:
Awesome coupon given to those that log into Maple World every day.

#cDouble-click to obtain the following effects:
Lv. 30 or lower
Weapon/Magic Attack: +20
Lv. 31 - 70
Weapon/Magic Attack: +30
Lv. 71 or higher
Weapon/Magic Attack: +40

 Stacks with other Non-Daily buffs.#

The capsule will expire once the event has ended.\n#cSwallowing this capsule will give you 10% EXP if you're Lv. 50 and below, 5% EXP if you're Lv. 50 - Lv. 99, and 2% EXP if you're Lv. 100 - Lv. 149. Cannot be used if you're under Lv. 10 or if you're Lv. 150 or higher (Cygnus Lv. 120).#

string.value: Cassandra's Amazing Hot Chocolate

string.name: desc
string.value: Cassandra made this hot chocolate just for YOU! And everyone else, most likely. Drink it to receive EXP based on your level. It is only available during the event.\n#c20% EXP if you're below Lv. 50, 10% EXP if you're Lv. 50 - Lv. 99, and 2% EXP if you're Lv. 100 - Lv. 149. 1% EXP for Lv. 150 and above. Only 3 can be used per day and it cannot be used if your character is Lv. 200 (Cygnus Lv. 120) or Xenon character.#

string.name: desc
string.value: 인기 데미지스킨 4종을 #c프리미엄 PC방#에서만 #c무한정#사용이 가능한 데미지스킨 상자이다. \n프리미엄 PC방 전용 데미지 스킨 상자에서 제공되는 데미지스킨 사용 중 다른 데미지 스킨을 적용할 경우 원래 캐릭터의 데미지 스킨이 변경된다. \n프리미엄 PC방에서 제공되는 데미지 스킨은 로그아웃 시 원래 캐릭터의 데미지 스킨으로 돌아간다.

string.value: A round clump of green algae that looks soft but has surprisingly little give when you poke it. It's often found floating in rivers, soaking up the sun.

string.name: name
string.value: Crassula Blossom

string.name: desc
string.value: The white flower of a crassula plant. These plants are usually found in rocky areas or mountain meadows.

string.name: name
string.value: Crassula Leaf

string.name: desc
string.value: The thick, succulent leaf of a crassula plant. \r\nThese plants are known for their ability to purify the air.

string.name: desc
string.value: The head of the plant looks like dark green flowers. They're found under rocks in the plains. \r\nContains a ton of vitamins.

string.name: name
string.value: Poison Mushroom

string.name: desc
string.value: These red-capped mushrooms grow under rocks. Dry them and then boil them to make their toxins into a usable poison.

string.name: name
string.value: Horny Mushroom

string.name: desc
string.value: A mushroom with what almost appear to be deer antlers on them. They're found near trees.

string.name: desc
string.value: Round, and almost ball-like. Look a little closer, and you'll see these flowers have a cotton candy-like softness.

string.name: name
string.value: Titan Arum

string.name: desc
string.value: These lively blooms are famous throughout Maple World. They look warm but smell like rotting flesh.

string.name: name
string.value: Monkey Orchid

string.name: desc
string.value: These curious flowers look like miniature Lupins from Ellinia! They grow on top of trees, just like monkeys!

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Bean Leaf

string.name: desc
string.value: The leaf of a pink bean plant. The beans from this plant looks like Pink Bean.

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Bean Fruit

string.name: desc
string.value: A fruit that looks like Pink Bean, a creature form another world. Stir fry it to make it sweet.

string.name: desc
string.value: These plants are known to produce sweet scents that attract insects. Touch it gently and you just might free a bug that was trapped inside!

string.name: name
string.value: Bellflower Fruit

string.name: desc
string.value: The reddish fruit that grows on a Bellflower. It kind of looks like ginseng.

string.name: name
string.value: Bellflower Root

string.name: desc
string.value: The memorable bitter taste of this root might actually be very, very good for your health!

string.name: name
string.value: Bee Bee Tree Fruit

string.name: desc
string.value: The bee bee tree looks like like the monster Rash from Leafre. Its fruit kind of looks like a chestnut.

string.name: name
string.value: Bee Bee Tree Leaf

string.name: desc
string.value: The bee bee tree looks like like the monster Rash from Leafre. It's leaves don't seem very useful.

string.name: name
string.value: Carrot Slime Leaf

string.name: desc
string.value: Carrot Slimes are usually found near water. Their leaves are edible but not very tasty.

string.name: name
string.value: Carrot Slime Root

string.name: desc
string.value: These roots are round and soft. They're supposed to be amazing for your skin.

string.name: name
string.value: Flower Fish Bloom

string.name: desc
string.value: Looks sort of like the bloom atop the Flower Fish at Aqua Road. Not much to write home about, to be honest.

string.name: name
string.value: Flower Fish Leaf

string.name: desc
string.value: Looks sort of like the fins of the Flower Fish at Aqua Road. Can be stir-fried and eaten, but be warned, it's quite fishy.

string.name: name
string.value: Borometz Fruit

string.name: desc
string.value: This fruit looks soft, warm, and cozy. Can be used like a sort of cotton.

string.name: name
string.value: Borometz Leaf

string.name: desc
string.value: Found in rocky areas. Dry them out and make tea! It'll taste like soup.

string.name: name
string.value: Musella Leaf

string.name: desc
string.value: These large leaves are perfect for shading you from the sun.

string.name: name
string.value: Musella Fruit

string.name: desc
string.value: This brightly colored fruit is like a golden lotus banana! Right?

string.name: name
string.value: Lotus Blossom

string.name: desc
string.value: Just looking upon this beautiful blossom seems to purify your spirit and uplift your soul.

string.name: name
string.value: Lotus Leaf

string.name: desc
string.value: These wide, green leaves have a pleasant scent. Perfect to be used for cooking or to drink as tea.

string.name: name
string.value: Purple Flower Blossom

string.name: desc
string.value: Round, shiny, and very expensive-looking!

string.name: name
string.value: Purple Flower Leaf

string.name: desc
string.value: Wide and rather stiff.

string.name: name
string.value: Skeleton Flower

string.name: desc
string.value: The petals of this delicate bloom turn transparent when they get wet!

string.name: name
string.value: Sunflower Blossom

string.name: desc
string.value: These large, cheery flowers adore the sunshine.

string.name: name
string.value: Sunflower Leaf

string.name: desc
string.value: Sunflower leaves aren't really very useful.

string.name: name
string.value: Horn Flower

string.name: desc
string.value: This flower grows on the horns of an Alpine Goat. A valuable specimen for the ongoing research taking place at Spring Valley.

string.name: name
string.value: Strobilanthes Oligantha

string.name: desc
string.value: Alpine Birds love to adorn themselves with this pretty bloom. A valuable specimen for the ongoing research taking place at Spring Valley.

string.name: name
string.value: Red Fruit

string.name: desc
string.value: The otters of Spring Valley love this fruit. A valuable specimen for the ongoing research taking place at Spring Valley.

string.name: desc
string.value: Extracted from the wings of a Spring Valley butterfly. A valuable specimen for the ongoing research taking place at Spring Valley.

string.name: name
string.value: Specimen Research Points

string.name: desc
string.value: Earn Research Points by collecting specimens and researching them at Spring Valley.\n#cDouble-click to earn Research Points.#

string.name: desc
string.value: The Heroic Android Pack contains a 30-day Neinheartroid Coupon (x1), a 30-day Heroes of Maple Cutout Chair Coupon (x1), the Secret Sign Damage Skin, a 30-day Selective 4 Slot Coupon (x1), a 7-day Royal Hair Coupon (x1), a 7-day Royal Face Coupon (x1) and a 30-day EXP Present Box (x1).

string.name: name
string.value: Heroes of Training Pack

string.name: desc
string.value: The Heroes of Training Pack contains a 30-day Hyper Teleport Rock (x1), a 30-day AP Reset Scroll (x1), a 30-day SP Reset Scroll (x1), 1 hour 2x Drop Coupons (x3), 1 hour 2x EXP Coupons (x3) and Heroes Coins (x25).

string.name: name
string.value: Heroes of Beauty Pack

string.name: desc
string.value: The Heroes of Beauty Pack contains a 3-day PSSB (x1), a 3-day Damage Skin Random Box (x1), a 3-day Chair Gachapon (x1), a 3-day Royal Hair Coupon (x1), a 3-day Royal Face Coupon (x1), 1 hour 2x Drop Coupons (x3), 1 hour 2x EXP Coupons (x3) and Heroes Coins (x25).

string.name: name
string.value: Heroes of Bossing Pack

string.name: desc
string.value: The Heroes of Bossing Pack contains a 7-day Epic Potential Scroll 100% (x1), a 7-day Perfect Potential Stamp (x1), a 30-day Onyx Apple (x3), a 90-day Respawn Token (x3), a 90-day Buff Freezer (x3), a 90-day Safety Charm (x3), 1 hour 2x Drop Coupons (x3), 1 hour 2x EXP Coupons (x3) and Heroes Coins (x25).

string.name: name
string.value: Hero of Heroes Pack

string.name: desc
string.value: The Hero of Heroes Pack contains a 7-day Unique Potential Scroll 100% (x1), a 7-day Perfect Potential Stamp (x1), a 7-day Black Cube (x1), a permanent Abraxas Chair (x1) and Heroes Coins (x100).

string.name: name
string.value: Heroes of Summer Pack

string.name: desc
string.value: The Heroes of Summer Pack contains a 30-day Gorilla Robo Pet (x1), a 7-day Hyper Teleport Rock (x1), 30-day Premium Pet Food (x2), 1 hour 2x Drop Coupons (x3) and 1 hour 2x EXP Coupons (x3).

string.name: desc
string.value:
★PC방 접속 시간 MVP 누적 금액 반영
★사냥 시 30% 추가 경험치, 아이템 드롭률 10% 증가, 제자리 부활
★스타포스 강화비용 5% 할인
★프리미엄 PC 퀵 슬롯 제공
★프리미엄 PC방 전용 메이플 유니온 일일 퀘스트
★메이플 옥션 판매 수수료 3%, 판매 등록 최대 48시간, 구매/판매 추가 슬롯 혜택
★전문 기술 채집&제작 레벨 10 미만일 시 숙련도 20% 추가 증가, 제작 시 성공 확률 최대 10% 증가, 장비 제작 시 잠재능력 및 에디셔널 잠재능력 에픽 등급 부여될 확률 2배, 장비 합성 시 잠재능력 및 에디셔널 잠재능력 에픽 이하 등급에서 승급 확률 2배, 황금 삽& 황금 곡괭이 자동 이용

string.name: name
string.value: Zesty Mane

string.name: name
string.value: Soft Sole

string.name: desc
string.value: A soft sole from an Unripe Wolfruit. It's soft but it doesn't smell good.

string.name: name
string.value: Chewy Sole

string.name: desc
string.value: A sole with a chewy texture from a Ripe Wolfruit. For some reason it still doesn't taste ripe.

string.name: name
string.value: Savory Fin

string.name: desc
string.value: Rough fins from a Green Catfish. Eating this could scratch up the roof of your mouth.

string.name: name
string.value: Tart Fins

string.name: desc
string.value: Tart fins from a Blue Catfish. Very pungent!

string.name: name
string.value: Crunchy Shell

string.name: desc
string.value: A shell from a Rhyturtle that has completely dried out. Loaded with essential vitamins and minerals.

string.name: name
string.value: Soft Shell

string.name: desc
string.value: A soft shell from Boss Rhyturtle. You'll need to chew it for awhile.

string.name: name
string.value: Slimy Feather

string.name: desc
string.value: A slimy feather from Crilia. Lots of empty calories here.

string.name: name
string.value: Sticky Feather

string.name: desc
string.value: A sticky feather from Patriarch Crilia. It tastes better than it looks.

string.name: name
string.value: Unpleasant Talon

string.name: desc
string.value: An unpleasant talon from Birdshark. The texture isn't great and the flavor is even worse.

string.name: name
string.value: Chewy Talon

string.name: desc
string.value: A chewy talon from Patriarch Birdshark. The texture is great but something about it repulses you.

string.name: name
string.value: Slurpy Fruit

string.name: desc
string.value: A magical fruit that makes any food taste great. Totally worth the hassle of harvesting.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c더블클릭#하면 PC방 접속 90시간 선물을 받을 수 있다.

#c-17성 유니크 앱솔랩스 무기

상자 사용 시 캐릭터의 직업에 맞는 장비가 지급되며, 제로는 사용할 수 없다.

지급받은 무기는 환생의 불꽃을 이용하여 추가옵션을 재설정 할 수 있다. 단, 강화, 잠재능력 재설정 및 토드의 망치 이용이 불가능하다.

A sugary-sweet box that gives #c500 Reward Points#, or if you're lucky, a special reward!

- 5,000 Maple Points
- 10,000 Maple Points
- 100,000 Maple Points
- 500,000 Maple Points
- 1,000,000 Maple Points
- Fairy Flight Full Package Coupon - 
Master Pony Full Package Coupon
- Master Glowy Butterfly Full Package Coupon

string.name: name
string.value: [Dice Master] Wrinkled Ticket

string.name: desc
string.value: When you collect and use Wrinkled Ticket x10, you can trade them for a #c[Dice Master] Game Entry Ticket.# Just #cdouble-click# on it to use it. You can get 50 per day per world, and it will disappear once the event is over.

string.name: name
string.value: Dice Master Buff

string.name: desc
string.value:
A buff item from Dice Master.
#cDouble-click# to use it. When you do, the number you roll on the die will determine which special buff is applied.
1. Ribbon Pig Transformation/1 min
2. Item Drop Rate +100%/30 min
3. Attack Power & Magic ATT +30/30 min
4. Critical Rate +20%/30 min
5. HP & MP +15%/30 min
6. Meso Drop Rate +100%/30 min

string.name: name
string.value: [Dice Master] Rigged Die 1

string.name: desc
string.value: A special die to use in Dice Master. It's got the same number on all its faces, so #cyou'll always roll a 1.# Be careful! If you get caught using this, you'll be called a dirty, rotten cheater!\r\n#cThis can't be used in the Bonus Stage and disappears when the event period is over.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
An Appreciation Gift Box for Alliance members ranked #cLegend IV and above.# #cDouble-click# to obtain various gifts. The box will disappear when it expires.

Guaranteed Rewards
#c- Chaos Circulator x1
- Black Rebirth Flame x1
- Final Alliance Growth Potion x1
- Star Force 13-Star Enhancement x1
- Spirit Ring Coupon x1
- Alliance Medal x350#

Potential Rewards
#c- Master Label 4 Hair Coupon (Selectable)
- 500,000 Maple Points
- Unique Potential Scroll 100%
- Petal Skin Coupon (Selectable)
- Star Planet Damage Skin
- 100,000 Maple Points
- Legendary AbsoLab Equipment Full Package
- Star Buddies Package#

Duration: 15 min
